input_text:
Job Title: Cybersecurity Engineer

Location: Manassas, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Cybersecurity Engineer
Gromelski and Associates, Inc. (GAI) partners with prime contractors to provide professional services. Key service areas include Engineering Design and Documentation; Software Development and Testing; System Integration, Testing and Evaluation; Lab Management and Field Installation; Integrated Logistics Support, Training Development and Delivery, Multimedia Support, and Technical System Support.
Cybersecurity Engineer Job Description:
Be part of the key Cyber engineering team that is building new security architectures across a large and critical DoD system of systems. Provide Cyber engineering expertise, while understanding architectural need and finding cyber solutions that can fit that need.
Cybersecurity Engineer Basic Qualifications:
Experience in scripting languages like Python.Bachelor’s degree from an accredited college in a related discipline, or equivalent experience/combined education. Knowledge with Linux systems and large system developmentExperience or understanding of basic networking. switch/router/firewall/IDS concepts.Experience in restudies and Cybersecurity capabilities, performing trade studies, and providing expertise to peers and leadership.
Cybersecurity Engineer Desired skills:
A desire to create new network and system capability and develop from design.Cloud experience such as Kubernetes and containers.Creative thinker with strong analytical, problem-solving skills, and a continuous learning mindset.
Cybersecurity Engineer Additional Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree from an accredited college in a related discipline, or equivalent experience/combined education, with 2 years of professional experience; or no experience required with a related Master’s degree.Must be able to obtain and keep a DoD Secret Clearance which means you must be a U.S. Citizen.Proactive/self-starter. Task driven with ability to work independently.Team player that takes ownership and develops relationships that foster team success.
Job: Full-Time Employee, 40 hours/week 
Benefits: We offer a competitive benefit package.  Click here Careers | GAI (e-gai.com) for more information.
Rate: Negotiable 
Start Date: Negotiable 
Job Location: Manassas, VA. (Relocation Assistance Available)
Gromelski & Associates is a proud Equal Opportunity / Affirmative Action employer. Equal Opportunity Employer/Minority/ Female/Disability/Veteran. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, protected veteran status, religion, creed, physical or mental disability, medical condition, marital status, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, age, or any other basis protected by law, ordinance, or regulation.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Cybersecurity Engineer
output_json.summary: Cybersecurity Engineer position at Gromelski and Associates, Inc.
job_responsibilities: Part of the Cyber engineering team
Offer expertise to peers and leadership
output_json.company_information: Gromelski and Associates, Inc. provides professional services including Engineering Design and Documentation, Software Development and Testing, System Integration, Lab Management, Field Installation, Integrated Logistics Support, Training Development and Delivery, Multimedia Support, and Technical System Support.
